CustomField.description: The Case record type to apply this rule to. Example: SSSW will be applied to all cases where the record type is prefixed with 'SSSW'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Case record type to apply this rule to. Example: SSSW will be applied to all cases where the record type is prefixed with 'SSSW'
CustomField.label: Target Case Record Type Prefix
